Interface MachineSpec

public interface MachineSpec

Author:
Jin Kwon

Method Summary
 boolean isFinishingTransition(Transition transition)
          Check if specified transition is for finishing or not.
 boolean isStartingTransition(Transition transition)
          Checks if specifed transition is a starting condition or not.

          Checks if specifed transition is permitted or not.
 

Method Detail

isStartingTransition

boolean isStartingTransition(Transition transition)
Checks if specifed transition is a starting condition or not. Once this method returns true, this method is never going to be invoked.

Parameters:
transition - transition to be checked
Returns:
true if specifed transition is starting transition, false otherwise

isTransitionAllowed

boolean isTransitionAllowed(Transition transition)
Checks if specifed transition is permitted or not.

Parameters:
transition - transition to be checked.
Returns:
true if given transition is allowed, false otherwise.

isFinishingTransition

boolean isFinishingTransition(Transition transition)
Check if specified transition is for finishing or not. Once this method returns true, this method is never going to be invoked.

Parameters:
transition - transition to be checked
Returns:
true if given transition means one of the finishing transitions of the machine, false otherwise.
